site_name: SAVE THEM ALL, LIFESAVERS RESCUE TRANSPORT

citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:2am -11:56am
on 22-AUG-2022.
Contacted the registrant via phone and left a message. Registrant responded to call and stated he was not available for
inspection.
End Section
